meta.title: Assi Dayan - Portrait by Eliran Bar-On
meta.description: An expressive oil painting capturing Israeli cultural icon Assi Dayan in a contemplative moment, inspired by Miri Mesika’s song.

openGraph.og:title: Assi Dayan - Portrait by Eliran Bar-On
openGraph.og:description: Explore Eliran Bar-On's expressive portrait of Assi Dayan, capturing the Israeli cultural icon in a contemplative moment.

structuredData.name: Assi Dayan
structuredData.description: An expressive portrait capturing Israeli cultural icon Assi Dayan in a contemplative moment, inspired by Miri Mesika’s song. The painting employs geometric planes of color creating a mosaic-like effect.
